actions.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 427 - 1 (Roll no. 23).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Hinchey.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 427 - 1 (Roll no. 23).

description: Amendment requires Treasury to immediately obtain information from recipients of TARP funds and their precise use of funds allocated prior to January 1, 2009, and further requires Treasury to conduct an analysis of the use of those funds within 30 days of enactment of the bill.
purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 111-3 to require Treasury to immediately obtain information from recipients of TARP funds and their precise use of funds allocated prior to January 1, 2009, and require the Treasury to conduct an analysis of the use of those funds within 30 days of enactment.
